verses.verse: My son <S%H1121><s%>, forget <S%H7911><s%> not my law <S%H8451><s%>; But let thy heart <S%H3820><s%> keep <S%H5341><s%> my commandments <S%H4687><s%>:
For length <S%H753><s%> of days <S%H3117><s%>, and years <S%H8141><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%>, And peace <S%H7965><s%>, will they add to thee <S%H3254><s%>.

Let not kindness <S%H2617><s%> and truth <S%H571><s%> forsake <S%H5800><s%> thee <S%H7194><s%>: Bind them about thy neck <S%H1621><s%>; Write <S%H3789><s%> them upon the tablet <S%H3871><s%> of thy heart <S%H3820><s%>:
So shalt thou find <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> and good <S%H2896><s%> understanding <S%H7922><s%> In the sight <S%H5869><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> and man <S%H120><s%>.
Trust <S%H982><s%> in Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> with all thy heart <S%H3820><s%>, And lean <S%H8172><s%> not upon thine own understanding <S%H998><s%>:
In all thy ways <S%H1870><s%> acknowledge <S%H3045><s%> him <S%H3474><s%>, And he will direct thy paths <S%H734><s%>.
Be not wise <S%H2450><s%> in thine own eyes <S%H5869><s%>; Fear <S%H3372><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and depart <S%H5493><s%> from evil <S%H7451><s%>:
It will be health <S%H7500><s%> to thy navel <S%H8270><s%>, And marrow <S%H8250><s%> to thy bones <S%H6106><s%>.
Honor <S%H3513><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> with thy substance <S%H1952><s%>, And with the first-fruits <S%H7225><s%> of all thine increase <S%H8393><s%>:
So shall thy barns <S%H618><s%> be filled <S%H4390><s%> with plenty <S%H7647><s%>, And thy vats <S%H3342><s%> shall overflow <S%H6555><s%> with new wine <S%H8492><s%>.
My son <S%H1121><s%>, despise <S%H3988><s%> not the chastening <S%H4148><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; Neither be weary <S%H6973><s%> of his reproof <S%H8433><s%>:
For whom Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> loveth <S%H157><s%> he reproveth <S%H3198><s%>; Even as a father <S%H1><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> in whom he delighteth <S%H7521><s%>.
Happy <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H120><s%> that findeth <S%H4672><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%>, And the man <S%H120><s%> that getteth <S%H6329><s%> understanding <S%H8394><s%>.
For the gaining <S%H5504><s%> of it is better <S%H2896><s%> than the gaining <S%H5505><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>, And the profit <S%H8393><s%> thereof than fine gold <S%H2742><s%>.
She is more precious <S%H3368><s%> than rubies <S%H6443><s%>: And none of the things thou canst desire <S%H2656><s%> are to be compared unto her <S%H7737><s%>.
Length <S%H753><s%> of days <S%H3117><s%> is in her right hand <S%H3225><s%>; In her left hand <S%H8040><s%> are riches <S%H6239><s%> and honor <S%H3519><s%>.
Her ways <S%H1870><s%> are ways <S%H1870><s%> of pleasantness <S%H5278><s%>, And all her paths <S%H5410><s%> are peace <S%H7965><s%>.
She is a tree <S%H6086><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%> to them that lay hold <S%H2388><s%> upon her <S%H833><s%>: And happy is every one that retaineth her <S%H8551><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> by wisdom <S%H2451><s%> founded <S%H3245><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>; By understanding <S%H2451><s%> he established <S%H3559><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%>.
By his knowledge <S%H1847><s%> the depths <S%H8415><s%> were broken up <S%H1234><s%>, And the skies <S%H7834><s%> drop down <S%H7491><s%> the dew <S%H2919><s%>.
My son <S%H1121><s%>, let them not depart <S%H3868><s%> from thine eyes <S%H5869><s%>; Keep <S%H5341><s%> sound wisdom <S%H8454><s%> and discretion <S%H4209><s%>:
So shall they be life <S%H2416><s%> unto thy soul <S%H5315><s%>, And grace <S%H2580><s%> to thy neck <S%H1621><s%>.
Then shalt thou walk <S%H3212><s%> in thy way <S%H1870><s%> securely <S%H983><s%>, And thy foot <S%H7272><s%> shall not stumble <S%H5062><s%>.
When thou liest down <S%H7901><s%>, thou shalt not be afraid <S%H6342><s%>: Yea <S%H7901><s%>, thou shalt lie down, and thy sleep <S%H8142><s%> shall be sweet <S%H6149><s%>.
Be not afraid <S%H3372><s%> of sudden <S%H6597><s%> fear <S%H6343><s%>, Neither of the desolation <S%H7722><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, when it cometh <S%H935><s%>:
For Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will be thy confidence <S%H3689><s%>, And will keep <S%H8104><s%> thy foot <S%H7272><s%> from being taken <S%H3921><s%>.
Withhold <S%H4513><s%> not good <S%H2896><s%> from them to whom it is due <S%H1167><s%>, When it is in the power <S%H410><s%> of thy hand <S%H3027><s%> to do it <S%H6213><s%>.
Say <S%H559><s%> not unto thy neighbor <S%H7453><s%>, Go <S%H3212><s%>, and come again <S%H7725><s%>, And to-morrow <S%H4279><s%> I will give <S%H5414><s%>; When thou hast it by thee <S%H3426><s%>.
Devise <S%H2790><s%> not evil <S%H7451><s%> against thy neighbor <S%H7453><s%>, Seeing he dwelleth <S%H3427><s%> securely by thee <S%H983><s%>.
Strive <S%H7378><s%> not with a man <S%H120><s%> without cause <S%H2600><s%>, If he have done <S%H1580><s%> thee no harm <S%H7451><s%>.
Envy <S%H7065><s%> thou not the man of violence <S%H376><s%>, And choose <S%H977><s%> none of his ways <S%H1870><s%>.
For the perverse <S%H3868><s%> is an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; But his friendship <S%H5475><s%> is with the upright <S%H3477><s%>.
The curse <S%H3994><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>; But he blesseth <S%H1288><s%> the habitation <S%H5116><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%>.
Surely he scoffeth <S%H3887><s%> at the scoffers <S%H3887><s%>; But he giveth <S%H5414><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> unto the lowly <S%H6035><s%>.
The wise <S%H2450><s%> shall inherit <S%H5157><s%> glory <S%H3519><s%>; But shame <S%H7036><s%> shall be the promotion <S%H7311><s%> of fools <S%H3684><s%>.
